channel.title: In My Opinion with Luyanda and Mom Jean
channel.managingEditor: in-my-opinion@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Luyanda Sibisi | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
channel.description:
Mother and daughter duo Jean and Luyanda are generations apart but they come together to talk about things that interest them ranging from self love, fitness, dating/marriage and pop culture.

Their unique bond makes for an exciting show riddled with moments of humour, deep reflection and learning.

Recorded and produced at https://SolidGoldStudios.co.za #BeHeard

item.author: in-my-opinion@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Luyanda Sibisi | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
item.itunes:author: Luyanda Sibisi | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: Cheers to a new decade
item.itunes:title: Cheers to a new decade
item.itunes:subtitle: New year, new...actually you’re doing alright
item.description:
We’re halfway through the new month (we took a break, sorry) and we think it’s important to evaluate what New Year’s resolution mean and how you can make them more impactful for the entirety of your life’s purpose. Plus mom Jean gives a shout out to all back to school moms and kids (and Lu is jealous cause she’s done raising kids lol)

Music Used : Inspiring Soft Background | Storyblocks Audio


Follow us on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/Inmyopinionpodcast/


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za

item.itunes:author: Luyanda Sibisi | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: Passion and Purpose | Sunni (Bad Bitch) and Phumi (Master Hustler)
item.itunes:title: Passion and Purpose | Sunni (Bad Bitch) and Phumi (Master Hustler)
item.itunes:subtitle: Our first guests on the show dropping serious nuggets
item.description:
In our last episode for 2019, our guests give us a glimpse into their journeys of self discovery, finding their purpose, and securing the bag. Follow @sunnifaba and @_phumlani to find out more about their hustle! Happy holidays!


Follow us on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/Inmyopinionpodcast/


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za

item.title: ‘Tis the Season
item.itunes:title: ‘Tis the Season
item.itunes:subtitle: Surviving the holidays
item.description:
The holidays are an amazing time to unwind and relax but can also trigger some anxiety. Let’s help you survive the “when are you getting married” questions and more! Follow our IG page @inmyopinion podcast for info mentioned in the episode

Music Used : Inspiring Soft Background | Storyblocks Audio


Follow us on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/Inmyopinionpodcast/

item.itunes:author: Luyanda Sibisi | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: Love Languages | Part 2
item.itunes:title: Love Languages | Part 2
item.itunes:subtitle: Let’s discuss the rules of engagement
item.description:
In part two we get into some technical aspects of love. Let’s tap into a list of questions we should all be asking to set healthy boundaries and expectations in relationships.


Osiuma Group is our “Go on with your bad self” shoutout for the week. www.osiumagroup.co.za

Music Used : Inspiring Soft Background | Storyblocks Audio


Follow us on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/Inmyopinionpodcast/


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za

item.author: in-my-opinion@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Luyanda Sibisi | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
item.itunes:author: Luyanda Sibisi | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: Love Languages | Part 1
item.itunes:title: Love Languages | Part 1
item.itunes:subtitle: We had to make it two parts cause....WOW
item.description:
We all want to experience love but do we understand it? Do we have examples of it and are we realistic about it? Jean and Lu unpack their experience with romantic love and Lu realizes that she can no longer use the movie Brown Sugar as a stencil to define her ideal love story.


The Nest Space in Greenside is our “Go on with your bad self” shout out for this week. http://thenestspace.co.za/

Music Used : Inspiring Soft Background | Storyblocks Audio


Follow us on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/Inmyopinionpodcast/


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za

item.author: in-my-opinion@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Luyanda Sibisi | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
item.itunes:author: Luyanda Sibisi | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: I Tweet What I Like
item.itunes:title: I Tweet What I Like
item.itunes:subtitle: *Checks Twitter* Why is she trending? What did she say? Is it even true?
item.description:
Hate it or love it, trending social media news is a thing and we look at some stories that stood out to us and dig deeper into reasons people say some of the things they say and the widespread impact of their long confessional threads.

Music Used : Inspiring Soft Background | Storyblocks Audio


Follow us on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/Inmyopinionpodcast/


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za

item.itunes:author: Luyanda Sibisi | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: Not Another Diet!
item.itunes:title: Not Another Diet!
item.itunes:subtitle: We get into the REAL reason why it’s so difficult to lose weight
item.description:
Losing weight is more about changing the inside and doing the work on emotional baggage. We dive into this phenomenon along with all the other diets we’ve been on...that DIDNT WORK!


Asante Blush is our “Go on with your Bad Self” shout out https://asanteblush.com/

Music Used : Inspiring Soft Background | Storyblocks Audio


Follow us on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/Inmyopinionpodcast/


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za

item.author: in-my-opinion@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Luyanda Sibisi | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
item.itunes:author: Luyanda Sibisi | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: Happy Birthday Mom Jean
item.itunes:title: Happy Birthday Mom Jean
item.itunes:subtitle: Jean turns 50! Our first episode is dedicated to her story.
item.description:
It’s the first episode! Get to know the mother and daughter duo, Jean and Luyanda. Jean shares an in-depth account of her story in honor of her birthday to reflect on her full life of lessons, learning and growth. Luyanda shares her story to and the inspiration behind why they started the podcast.

Music Used : Inspiring Soft Background | Storyblocks Audio


Follow us on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/Inmyopinionpodcast/


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za
